text: (ai rasool) ab un (nau) ke baad (aur) auraten tumhaare vaaste halaal nahin aur na ye jaayaz hai ki unake badale unamen se kisee ko chhodakar aur beebiyaan kar lo agar che tumako unaka husn kaisa hee bhala (kyon na) maaloom ho magar tumhaaree laundiyaan (is ke baad bhee jaayaz hain) aur khuda to har cheez ka nigaro hai
